nodes.text: Dybrin was a planet located in the Deep Core region. The historian and author Eloc Throno included a map with the location of Dybrin in his book Traveler's Guide to Batuu, a guide that detailed the planet Batuu and its inhabitants. Dybrin shared its name with the Deep Core moon Dybrin 12, homeworld of the Dybrinthe species.
Dybrin was mentioned in the 2020 reference book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: Traveler's Guide to Batuu, written by Cole Horton.
